name: Imperfect Red
description:
“Love makes your heart race. If it means you’re loved in the end, be much more aggressive.. Because you will get a chance. The angel of Love smiles at you.. Can you see the angel’s white wings? or her eyes gazing at you.. her sweet voice, her gentle hands? She is here just for you.. She is protecting you.. from somewhere nearby.”

This is from Satoshi Kon’s 1997 Perfect Blue (based from Yoshikazu Takeuchi’s Perfect Blue: Metamorphosis パーフェクト・ブルー　完全変態, Pāfekuto Burū: Kanzen Hentai)

What's red is Blood, my dear..
and if there's a Perfect Blue, so here's an Imperfect Red.
